text: One morningー

name: Me
text: Badum ba dum dum dum...♪

name: Me
text: Mhahhh, this feels like heaven♪ Yup, taking a bath in the morning is the best.
I was humming a random tune while enjoying the cypress-scented steam.
...*Rattle*... *Stomp, stomp*...

name: Me
text: Hm?
Something that sounded like noisy footsteps interrupted my humming.

name: Me
text: What's all this so early in the morning? And it seems like it's coming closer...
*SLAM!!!*

name: Igawa Sakura
text: I'm late! I said I'M LATE!

name: Me
text: S-Sakura!? What are you doing suddenly barging in here!?

name: Sakura
text: It's because you just won't come out, Fumachin!! I always wash my hair in the morning! Get out already!

name: Me
text: L-Listen, you... you're a freeloader here...
I was calling her Sakura, but... this was not the Sakura-sensei of Gosha Academy.
This was the "young Sakura" we had met in that unbelievable incident a few days ago, who had traveled through time and space from another dimension.
So basically she was the same person but from a different dimension.
While we had been fighting that dimension-traveling monster, various stuff happened and she wasn't able to return home, so I was letting her freeload in my house for the time being.

name: Sakura
text: You're gonna be late too, Fumachin! What are you doing, all relaxed in the bathtub like that! ...HMM?

name: Sakura
text: Did you plan to take advantage of the confusion and sneak a peek at the naked body of the super cute Sakura-chan? You pervert!?

name: Me
text: What are you talking about... And you, are you planning to attend the Gosha Academy of this world?

name: Me
text: In this world, Igawa Sakura is a teacher at Gosha Academy.

name: Sakura
text: Ah...! Then... um... I'll disguise myself...

name: Me
text: Everyone's going to see through that! And more importantly, today is Sunday. There are no classes today.

name: Sakura
text: Oopsie! Hooboy! Why didn't you tell me earlier! Nahahaha!

name: Me
text: (Sheesh...)
That personality of Sakura-sensei seemed to have been unchanged since her schooldays. I shook my wet head.

name: Me
text: Sakura... what are you still standing around for? You understand now, so why not go back to sleep or...

name: Sakura
text: Nah, I was just thinking that you have a surprisingly nice body, Fuma-kun♪ A feast for the eyes, a feast for the eyes♪

name: Me
text: Huuuh?! Who's the pervert now!!!?

name: Sakura
text: Aha♪ Looking a bit won't hurt anything♪

name: Me
text: It will! It's hurting my peace of mind! Get out, you pervert!!!

name: Sakura
text: I'm just gonna snap a pic♪

name: Me
text: Hey, stop it!!
Without thinking, I stood up in the bathtub and reached for Sakura who was getting her smartphone ready.

name: Sakura
text: Kyaaaaah♪

name: Me
text: Damn it, I'll dunk you in the bathtub if you take a picture!!
I grabbed Sakura's wristーand at that moment...
Ahem...

name: Sakura
text: Uh oh, Tokiko-san!?
Since when had she been standing there? As she cleared her throat, I scrambled and properly sat back down in the bathtub.

name: Fuma Tokiko
text: Sakura-sen... I mean Sakura-chan, please stop playing around with Master.

name: Sakura
text: Ahaha... sorry. I didn't mean to, but it was funny, so I...

name: Me
text: You little... So, did you need something, Tokiko?

name: Tokiko
text: Headmistress Asagi asked for you to come to the academy as quickly as possible.

name: Me
text: Headmistress Asagi did?
Calling for me on a Sunday, did that mean that there was some kind of incident?
With a sideways glance at the confused-looking Sakura, I hurriedly jumped out of the bath and shoved my wet legs into my underwear.
Hebiko woke up amidst stifling humidity and the smell of soil.
A dimly lit space. Lamps were hanging haphazardly, casting light on the bare earthen walls.

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: Ugh... hm?

name: Hebiko
text: This is...? Why is Hebiko here...?
Her head was foggy and her vision blurred. Hebiko couldn't understand what had happened.

name: Hebiko
text: Anyways, Hebiko has to get back...
She quickly checked her body with some difficulty and found her Taima-Suit was fully intact. Her kodachi, which were her specialty, were also equipped.
However, she was feeling dizzy and she couldn't gather her strength.
This way...
From somewhere, she heard a voice beckoning her. In her dazed state, only that voice reverberated in her ears.
This way. Come on, over here.

name: Hebiko
text: ーー...
Hebiko slowly stood up and started to walk. It was just as though she was being guided by the voice.
Yesーgood girl...
She kept going and going through a long underground passage.
And finallyー
WOOAAAAAAAAAAAH...
Suddenly, the scenery opened up. Hebiko squinted reflexively at the overflowing light and cheering.

name: Hebiko
text: ...What is this!?
The place reminded her of an ancient Roman arena. The seats were filled with men who were shouting vulgarities and screaming in a frenzy.

name: Announcer
text: Our deepest apologies for the delay!! Today we present to you a new warrior!!!

name: Spectators
text: It's about tiiiime!

name: Announcer
text: You are all familiar with the archenemy of we who live in darkness! Yes!!! One of the loathsome Taimanin!! Her name is Hebiko! Hebiko the Taimanin!!

name: Spectators
text: WOOHHHHHHHHH!!!!!

name: Hebiko
text: W-Warrior...!? I-Is he talking about Hebiko...!? What's going on...!?

name: Announcer
text: Let's start with an exhibition match!!! Will Miss Hebiko be a worthy warrior of Chaos Arena!!?

name: Announcer
text: Her first opponents will be... these guys!!
Spurred on by the announcement, bizarre-looking monsters entered from the opposite side of the arena.

name: Announcer
text: The masters of slaughter and defilement you all know well! They live in showers of blood and dying wails, the demented High Orc warriors!!!

name: High Orc
text: Hehehe... she looks like a treat. Isn't she a tasty-looking Taimanin girl.
The High Orcs were advancing one step at a time while licking their lips.

name: Hebiko
text: Wh-What...?!
Hebiko shook her groggy head and unsheathed her trusty blades.

name: Hebiko
text: What the hell is going on here...!?

name: Announcer
text: If the cute Hebiko-chan loses, tragedy is inevitable!! What will her destiny be...!?

name: Announcer
text: Let the exhibition match... BEGIN!!!

name: Spectators
text: WOAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!
